response.original_title: Art of Darkness: Making the Lighthouse
response.overview: Robert Pattinson and Willem Dafoe describe their on-set experiences alongside Robert Eggers and the crew that brought the world of 1890s Maine to life, featuring interviews with Cinematographer Jarin Blaschke, Production Designer Craig Lathrop, and Costume Designer Linda Muir (all repeat collaborators of Robert Eggers).
response.title: Art of Darkness: Making the Lighthouse
